text: Hamza Dursun (born 11 February 1994) is a Turkish cross-country skier. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. Hamza was born in the Ağrı province of Turkey. His hobbies include fishing, swimming and basketball. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Turkish male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Turkey
title: Hamza Dursun
